name: RamaRaksha
0:
”Alexa, launch rama raksha”
”Alexa, start rama raksha”
”Alexa, open rama raksha”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rama raksha
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The composer of the Rama Raksha Stotra is Budha Kaushika, a Rishi. Special public recitation of the stotra is organized during religious festivals, especially during Navaratri celebrations, when continuous recitation takes place from Gudi Padwa till Rama Navami day, the birthday of Lord Rama

To play Rama Raksha Stotra in alexa ,Just enable the skill and say
Alexa, launch rama raksha
Alexa, start rama raksha
Alexa, open rama raksha


Now set the "Rama raksha" for routine on your Alexa app in a few simple steps: 

1.Open the Alexa app on your mobile device
2.In the bottom right corner, select [More]
3.Select [Routines]
4.Select the [+] icon in the top right corner to add a new routine
5.Select [When This Happens] to add a trigger for your routine
6.Next, select [Add action] to add a skill.
7.Select [Skills] and the skill "Rama raksha".
8.Once you've added a few actions, you can organize them, by holding and dragging the [=] icon
9.You can also select [The device you speak to] if you would like Alexa to respond from a device of your choosing.
10.When you're happy with your routine, select [Save] in the top right corner. It might take a minute or so for Alexa to upload your routine.

Disclaimer: The skill content is played in Hindi Language
